long_description: The CycleAware Roadie mirror is a sleek and aerodynamic bar end mirror designed for use on a road bike. It provides an amazingly wide angle view. It's lightweight, stable and durable, and adjusts to any viewing angle. Roadie mirror stays out of your way during climbs and descents; convex mirror provides a clear and stable reflection. You can even see a steady image of what's behind you while you're down in the drops. Compatible with all handlebars.
